Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

From: UnderT4976@...

:: Wolfgang ::    Yes, Dracona, orders.... Just a sec.

(( Reptilica, Bloodystrike, and Perdabot are inside the base. ))

Now, for orders. Dracona, Reptilica, Bloodystrike, and Perdabot get over 
here. I have an idea. You see, the Maximals are getting ready for the 
Predicon attack and are in no position to fight. They are weak at this point. 
That's where we come in. We will make a hit-and-run attack on the Maximals. 
We will be in and out so fast they won't know what hit 'um. We cannot stay 
long for they have more attack power. This will startle them and leave them 
open for the Predicon attack. I'll contact Hellbeast and ask for some men. 

:: Activates comlink to Hellbeast's transmission. Wolfgang informs Hellbeast 
of the plan. ::
